pullRequest.title: Feature/task 539 refactor svn backend
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implemented SVN backend
Refactored SVN UI to use the backend
Some refactorings in the git ui implementation
Created common handler utility classes for IVirSatVersionControlBackend implementations
Fixed remaining comments from pr #538

For the review please note that we changed the name of some packages from *.action to -> *.handler
Closes #539

Add abstract version control handlers - (Task #539)

Refactor the handler class hierarchy:
- Add AVersionControlHandler
- Add AVersionControlUpdateHandler
- Add AVersionControlCommitHandler
- Add svn handlers
- Use new handlers in plugin.xml

Fixed cleanup issue - (Task #539)

- Fixed issue where a file is attempted to be deleted but it already
doesnt exist due to git cleaning it up. This could happen with temporary
git meta data files.
